statements: UPDATE pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns SET email_subject = 'New Campaign Alert', email_content = 'Exciting offers await you!', click_through_rate = 12.5 WHERE campaign_id = 1;

UPDATE pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns SET start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2023-02-28', open_rate = 8.75, target_audience = 'Healthcare Professionals' WHERE campaign_name = 'Winter Wellness Campaign';
UPDATE pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns SET email_subject='New Campaign Update' WHERE campaign_id=1;
UPDATE pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns SET email_content='Exciting announcement! Click for details.' WHERE campaign_name='Spring Sale';
UPDATE email_campaigns SET total_clicks = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE email_recipients SET subscription_status = false, last_opened_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE recipient_id = 3;
UPDATE email_recipients SET last_opened_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE recipient_id = 12345;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET total_clicks = 500, total_recipients = 1500 WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
UPDATE Emails SET open_status = TRUE WHERE email_id = 123;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 1500.00, target_audience = 'New Customers' WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE Emails SET open_status = TRUE WHERE email_id = 1;
UPDATE Clicks SET product_clicked = 'Product X', purchased = TRUE WHERE click_id = 5;
UPDATE campaigns SET target_audience = 'New Target Audience' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET subject_line = 'Updated Subject Line', send_date = '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE email_id = 3;
UPDATE campaigns SET target_audience = 'New Audience', campaign_name = 'Updated Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET subject_line = 'Updated Subject Line', recipient_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE email_id = 3;
UPDATE EmailSubscribers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE EmailMessages SET status = 'SENT', send_date = '2023-01-20 08:00:00' WHERE message_id = 3;
UPDATE EmailSubscribers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 15000.00, status = 'Active' WHERE campaign_id = 5;
